GeneDef.label: androdite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of impregnating others.

GeneDef.label: gynodite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of being impregnated by others.

GeneDef.label: hermaphrodite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of impregnating and being impregnated by others.

GeneDef.label: potendite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene cannot be impregnated, but can impregnate anyone, even those who normally cannot get pregnant.

GeneDef.label: recepdite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene cannot impregnate others, but can be impregnated by anyone, even those who normally cannot impregnate.

GeneDef.label: reflectite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene cannot be impregnated, but can only impregnate those who could normally impregnate others.

GeneDef.label: solicite
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene cannot impregnate others, but can only be impregnated by those who could normally be impregnated.
